name: Cheater 1.5
description:
Welcome to cheat, a game where your goal is to cheat on your girlfriend. 

Controls.

WASD to move, Space to jump, and E to interact with buttons.

Credit to Justden for making the music for this game. Check out his music here: https://justden.newgrounds.com/

Some notes:

This is 1.5, if you played the original you might ask, why make another page for this? Well, the original one was made for a game jam, also this is rebuilt from the ground up as I lost the source code to the original game in a hard drive crash. So this deserves its own page. You can play the original here: https://twingamerdudes.itch.io/cheater
